mean_cn: adj.附加的，辅助的，下级的；  n.附属物，配件，添加剂
mean_en: added to a teaching staff for only a short time or in a lower position than other staff
sentence: Magnifying glasses are an important adjunct tool for us to better pay attention to the subtleties of things.
sentence_trans: 放大镜是我们更好关注事物细微的重要辅助工具。
word_etyma: ad\u003dto去+junct结合，连接→连接上去→附属物；助手
